thread.title: Zimbabwe: Vendors' Goods Burnt

title: Zimbabwe: Vendors' Goods Burnt
text:
South Africa: Free State Health Inquiry - Patients Speak By Freeman Razemba 
Various clothes and goods worth thousands of dollars belonging to vendors were burnt to ashes last night in unclear circumstances. 
The cause of fire is still not known as investigations are still in progress. 
Chief police spokesperson senior assistant commissioner Charity Charamba said she was yet to get the details of the case. 
The chief executive officer of Queen of Grace ZimAsset Trust Mr Ephraim Chizola confirmed that some of the clothes belong to their members who operated under the Rezende Street foot bridge. 
He said they were yet to ascertain the value of the goods and a report has since been made to the police. Zimbabwe
